channel.title: Agnostic Brothers Podcast
channel.description: Do you feel it's impossible to really know if a god exists? Do you believe the opposite? Join Nick and Jake as they discuss religion, free thought and skepticism.
channel.itunes:author: The Agnostic Brothers
channel.itunes:subtitle: Join Nick and Jake as they discuss religion, free thought and skepticism
channel.itunes:summary: Do you feel it's impossible to really know if a god exists? Do you believe the opposite? Join Nick and Jake as they discuss religion, free thought and skepticism.

item.description: Nick watches YouTube With no Jake this episode, Nick rambles about stuff he saw on YouTube.

item.title: Episode 25
item.description: Illinois Civil Unions Nick's "backstory" is discussed in this episode. Nick and Jake discuss Illinois Civil Unions and adoption issues, as well as some church scams.

item.itunes:summary: Nick and Jake discuss Illinois Civil Unions and adoption issues, as well as some church scams.

item.title: Episode 22
item.description: Thermodynamics Do the laws of Thermodynamcs disprove Evolution? Do the laws of Thermodynamics prove a God exists? Noooope!
item.itunes:author: The Agnostic Brothers
item.itunes:subtitle: Thermodynamics
item.itunes:summary: Do the laws of Thermodynamcs disprove Evolution? Do the laws of Thermodynamics prove a God exists? Noooope!

item.title: Episode 21
item.description: Sharia Law Is Sharia law really a threat to the American way of life? Only if you ignore silly things like the Constitution

item.itunes:summary: Is Sharia law really a threat to the American way of life? Only if you ignore silly things like the Constitution.

item.title: Episode 20
item.description: The "War on Christmas" is ending In this episode, the Agnosic Brothers will discuss the politically correct "War on Christmas" and go over what Nick needs to believe in God.
item.itunes:author: The Agnostic Brothers
item.itunes:subtitle: The "War on Christmas" is ending
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, the Agnosic Brothers will discuss the politically correct "War on Christmas" and go over what Nick needs to believe in God.

item.title: Episode 19
item.description: Religious Freedom for some? Jake is unable to make it for this episide but Nick will talk about the Islamic center being built near Ground Zero. As one person alone has a hard time getting sidetracked, this will be a short episode.
item.itunes:author: The Agnostic Brothers
item.itunes:subtitle: Religious Freedom for some?
item.itunes:summary: Jake is unable to make it for this episide but Nick will talk about the Islamic center being built near Ground Zero. As one person alone has a hard time getting sidetracked, this will be a short episode.

item.title: Episode 18
item.description: Nick and Jake ramble about gay marriage Join Nick and Jake for one of their less structured podcasts (yeah, that does sound scary) as they discuss the reversal of Proposition 8 in California and some of the arguments against gay marriage

item.itunes:subtitle: Nick and Jake ramble about gay marriage

item.title: Episode 17
item.description: Special Guest This Episode! Jimmy joins Nick and Jake to tell us about his deconversion. Do atheists really have a double standard by rejecting the idea of a god?
item.itunes:author: The Agnostic Brothers
item.itunes:subtitle: Special Guest This Episode!
item.itunes:summary: Jimmy joins Nick and Jake to tell us about his deconversion. Do atheists really have a double standard by rejecting the idea of a god?.

item.title: Episode 16
item.description: Is Congress trying to silence churches? Nick and Jake discuss their first bad review, a Supreme Court case regarding religious organizations 'right' to discriminate and the AFA's latest abmonination.
item.itunes:author: The Agnostic Brothers
item.itunes:subtitle: Is Congress trying to silence churches?
item.itunes:summary: Nick and Jake discuss their first bad review, a Supreme Court case regarding religious organizations 'right' to discriminate and the AFA's latest abmonination.

item.title: Episode 13
item.description: Intro Skype Edition! Religous Literacy, What Every American Needs to Know - And Doesn't by Stephen Prothero Hatian Earthquake Related News Tips for Arguing Against Religion - Preaching in the guise of 'opinion' or 'education' A podcast you should be listening to, Irreligiosophy http://www.irreligiosophy.com Church signs: Don't Curse the Darkness, Be the Candle - Sin is Washed Away With the Purity of Christ Outro

item.description: Intro Sorry, no Nick this week. He will be back, I promise!!! Me at McDonalds. My Gospel of Doubt. Church Signs If God is your Co-Pilot, Swap Seats Thought Church was dull? So did we. Interview wtih Richard from the Peoria Humanist Society Outro

item.title: Quick Update
item.description: Sorry guys! We recorded the episode but apparently Audacity had other plans Maybe someone is trying to tell us something Anywhooooo, don't worry, we are still recording episodes. We only had a technical snafu We will have a new episode up by 9/6/09 at the latest! Thanks for all your patience
item.itunes:author: The Agnostic Brothers
item.itunes:summary: Sorry guys! We recorded the episode but apparently Audacity had other plans Maybe someone is trying to tell us something Anywhooooo, don't worry, we are still recording episodes. We only had a technical snafu We will have a new episode up by 9/6/09 at the latest! Thanks for all your patience
item.itunes:subtitle: Quick Update
